events.title: Major DDoS wave hits Baltic critical infrastructure attributed to Russian threat actor
events.summary: A coordinated DDoS campaign targeted utility and telecommunications services in the Baltic states, with indicators suggesting involvement of a known Russian state-sponsored group. NATO allies issue joint alert.

events.title: Critical zero-day in satellite communications hardware exploited by unknown actor
events.summary: Security researchers observe active exploitation of a previously undisclosed zero-day in major satellite communications hardware; advisories published by multiple national CERTs.

events.title: Chinese APT expands campaign against Asian telecom operators
events.summary: Researchers observe a new campaign attributed to a Chinese Advanced Persistent Threat (APT) group targeting telecom operators across Asia with modified RAT payloads, likely also gathering infrastructural intelligence for wider use.

events.title: Norwegian energy sector flagged for increased reconnaissance activity by domestic CERT
events.summary: The Norwegian energy operator community has received alerts from the national CERT regarding unusual reconnaissance activity on SCADA/ICS networks; stakeholders advised to increase detection and filtering of inbound connections.

events.title: US DHS issues group of advisories on ransomware gangs linked to Chinese infrastructure
events.summary: The U.S. Department of Homeland Security issues a set of advisories linking ransomware operators to Chinese-based cloud infrastructure and highlights risk of spill-over to NATO partners.
